title: Job Listing Schema
description: The Job Listing Archetype - Essential properties that define a job listing

_id.description: Unique identifier for this archetype record

draft.description: Indicates this archetype record is a draft and is not published

created.description: Date and time this archetype record was created in ISO 8601 date standard e.g. YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD

updated.description: Date and time this archetype record was updated in ISO 8601 date standard e.g. YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD

compensation.description: Compensation in cents as an integer (whole number)

listing_region.description: The general region where the job listing is located.  Can be a US state, or a province, for instance.

company_logo.description: Image Archetype ID to use as the company logo of this job listing

category.description: General category of the job listing, e.g. Engineering

subcategory.description: Specific category of the job listing, e.g. Biomedical Engineering

tags.description: Array of Tag Archetypes that are used to help categorize this Archetype record
